text: Who do you want to return the settlement to?
A Noble, on a diplomatic mission, has been kidnapped, their most wealthy family want you to track down the assailant and bring the Noble back unharmed.
We have more important matters to attend to
Our caravans keep getting attacked and ransacked, escort them safely to their destination and bring an end to this thuggery.
The locals live in fear, constantly pillaged, the elder has requested “Hired Thugs” for their protection.

Locals have been going mysteriously missing, first it was couple at night but now its swathes and in broad daylight. Hunt down whatever is behind this and slay them, gods willing you might be able to rescue some of the missing folk.
A local fortification has been taken and their garrison wiped out. We have sent a relief force but coupled with your army we have a good chance to scour the place clean.
It pays well, we can spare the time
We have more important matters to attend to
This should give Dietrich time to find us better work
We have more important matters to attend to
Listen to the silence, something has frightened even the animals speechless
We have more important matters to attend to
We will cleanse it with gunpowder and steel
We have more important matters to attend to
A travelling Wizard fears he is being stalked, he says they are after  an object he is researching and it is imperative it remains in his hands at all cost.

A flight of Dragons have made nest nearby. After much devastation, and the failing of local forces an army has been sent but their Commander has approached us wishing to bolster their forces. The dragons have apparently amassed quite the hoard of treasure which the commanding officer says is ours for the taken, dependent on the dragons being slain of course.
A logistical error has left a garrison severely depleted, the Garrison commander has asked us to join rank until the relief force arrives.
A known collaborator of the forces of darkness, escaped from imprisonment, aided his followers. We’ve been tasked to track him down and bring him back dead or alive, preferably the former.
A large enemy force has gained the attention of the local Ruler. They have sent out an army to vanquish it but they request you join them to shore up their forces and will pay well for your aid.
We have more important matters to attend to
We have more important matters to attend to
How hard can babysitting an Outpost be
We have more important matters to attend to
This notorious criminal will be brought to justice
We have more important matters to attend to
We will cleanse it with gunpowder and steel
We have more important matters to attend to

A Nest of Ratmen has been found nearby, we’ve been tasked with burning it out and slaying all that reside. They’ve said on top of the regular payment, they will pay us 12 crowns per head and anything of worth in the Nest is ours to keep.

A cloaked messenger has approached us, a nearby Necromancer has found a powerful artifact that they are using to resurrect the dead. They have tasked us we killing the Necromancer and destroying the artifact.
A travelling trader has wandered into camp, asking if we wish to see his wares?
We have crossed paths with a Trade Caravan, realising we mean them no harm, the Wagon Master has invited us trade.
A small Trading Outpost, perhaps we may find something of value here.
Empty the store wagon, we’ll need to fill it with Rat heads.
We have more important matters to attend to
Put them back in their graves
We have more important matters to attend to
There is nothing of note here
There is nothing of note here
There is nothing of note here

A small army has been sent to repulse an invading band of Trolls, short of troops the commander has given us the following proposition ‘Help us spill their black blood and we will see your coffers overflow’.
A Greenskin camp has been spotted nearby, we should give them a taste of their own medicine and take their spoils for ourselves.
We have more important matters to attend to
We can always use more coin
We have more important matters to attend to
We have more important matters to attend to

A local brewery needs assistance in repelling a band of drunken giants. The guards have recently been conscripted into the army leaving it virtually defenceless. If you can drive them away you’ll each get a keg of beer as well as your fee. We can not allow the beer to be wasted on these ignorant giants.
Whatever the price, we have mouths to feed
I heard you're low on money. Do you want a loan? Our price is fair.

Men ready yourselves for battle, the taste of fear is on your lips. I say spit out the fear, drive out the fear with bloodlust. Give no quarter, no pity, no mercy, slay and slay again and you might live.
Important it may be, but time is precious and while these lands may fall we ensure that order remains steadfast.

A huge swarm of enemies flood across the borders, hell bent on destroying everything in their wake. The whole army has been sent to repel them but still they find themselves severely outnumbered. They have asked for our assistance so we may even the odds.\\n\\nIf we refuse the enemies will bring ruin to these lands, be under no illusion this is no mere raid, this an invasion and this could well be these folks last stand.
